categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic battalions

nodes.text: Carnivore Battalion was a clone trooper brigade, within the famed 501st Legion, which answered to clone trooper captain CT-7567.

During the Battle of Devaron Carnivore Battalion, originally stationed aboard the Resolute, manned the All Terrain Tactical Enforcer designated 773 and, along with two other brigades and two Jedi, boarded a CIS Munificent-class star frigate and proceeded to hunt the bounty hunter Cad Bane, wanted by the Galactic Republic for numerous crimes.
